text: A bear broke into the campsite- pay $200 for new supplies
You stumbled upon a dinosaur fossil- Collect $1000
A storm flooded your tent- pay $100 for repairs
You hitchhiked to the next stop- Collect $50
Weekend trip to the Grand Canyon!
Free ride to your next destination- keep until needed
A mountain lion ravaged your food supply- Move back 5
Sunny days ahead- Advance to Bicycling
